description:
Gorgeous entire 2 BR apartment in Sugar Hill / Hamilton Heights! 20 minutes to midtown from nearby express and local trains (ABCD1). Great beds, huge comfy couch, beautiful kitchen, feng shui decor. This unique apartment on a quiet block uptown will be your peaceful escape during your trip to New York. 

Near a great grocery store and local favorites like Harlem Public, At The Wallace, The Handpulled Noodle, The Chipped Cup, Monkey Cup, Hamilton Bakery, Mama Sushi, and Anchor Wine Bar.

Both bedrooms have awesome mattresses, living room has a giant, super comfy couch and a fantastic entertainment setup, roku tv and speedy wifi, and the kitchen has gorgeous stainless appliances, dishwasher, and granite countertops.

Whole apt

Awesome coffee shops, bars, and restaurants like Harlem Public, At The Wallace, The Handpulled Noodle, Chipped Cup, Monkey Cup, Hamilton Bakery, Mama Sushi, Tsion Cafe, Anchor Wine Bar, and many more!

3 Blocks from the ABCD (145th St. stop) and 4 blocks from the 1 (145th st)

Please take your shoes off when inside the apartment! We will leave some space for you on our shoe rack at the door.
name: Gorgeous, Peaceful true 2 BR in Hamilton Heights
review:
Apartamento bem aconchegante e bem e organizado. Ótima localização. Estações de metrô bem próximo. Inclusive a linha "A" que dá acesso ao Aeroporto JFK.  Super indico.
Fatima.
Rio de Janeiro - Brasil.
